channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP Business One (Cookbooks)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP Business One (Cookbooks)

item.title: CVE-2021-27613|2024-08-03T21:26:09.713Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20business%20one%20%28cookbooks%29
item.description: Under certain conditions, SAP Business One Chef cookbook, version - 9.2, 9.3, 10.0, used to install SAP Business One, allows an attacker to exploit an insecure temporary folder for incoming & outgoing payroll data and to access information which would otherwise be restricted, which could lead to Information Disclosure and highly impact system confidentiality, integrity and availability.
